title: Thai cucumber soup
ingredients: ['30g butter', '2 tablespoons sliced spring onion', '3 cucumbers, peeled and chopped', '75ml red wine vinegar', '1L chicken stock', '500ml water', '3 red or green chillies, seeded and minced', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 tablespoon lemongrass, chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '125ml soured cream']
